movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A young noble inherits a dangerous planet and must fight to protect it from evil forces.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: James Bond faces off against a dangerous villain in his final mission as 007.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: Bruce Wayne, as Batman, investigates a serial killer terrorizing Gotham City.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.description: Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell, a seasoned fighter pilot, is tasked with training a group of elite graduates for a dangerous mission.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully and Neytiri form a family and must protect their home from new threats.

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: Neo is freed from the Matrix once again and must face a new threat to humanity.

movies.title: Free Guy
movies.description: A bank teller discovers he's actually a character in a video game.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.description: A group of supervillains are tasked with a dangerous mission.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker's identity is revealed, forcing him to team up with past Spider-Men to defeat a powerful villain.

movies.title: Eternals
movies.description: Ancient beings known as Eternals are forced to reveal themselves to protect the Earth from the Deviants.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi, a master of martial arts, must confront his past and fight against the Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.description: The story of Cruella de Vil's rise to power.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past and fights against a dangerous conspiracy.

movies.title: The French Dispatch
movies.description: A collection of stories from an American newspaper bureau in a fictional French city.

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies.description: Doctor Strange navigates the multiverse to protect reality from an ominous threat.
